import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getCategories } from '../../store/CatgoriesSlice'; import { getProducts } from '../../store/ProductsSlice'; import { addToCart } from "../../store/CartSlice"; import style from './LimitProducts.module.scss' export default function LimitProducts() { const { products , isLoading} = useSelector((state) => state.products); let [modalData, setModalData] = useState(""); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProducts(1)); dispatch(getCategories()) }, [dispatch]); let getData = (state) => { setModalData(state); }; return ( <>

Products

Trendy

{isLoading? <>
:
{products.slice(0, 8).map((item) => (
(e.currentTarget.src = item.images[1])} onMouseOut={(e) => (e.currentTarget.src = item.images[0])} />

{item.title}

getData(item)} data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#staticBackdrop" >

{modalData.title}

{modalData.description}

))}
}
) }
